en.description: A VSCode extension that keep giving you compliment while you are coding.
en.tip-rainbow-fart-content: Rainbow Fart is a literal translation word from Chinese, it's mean give somebody exaggerated compliment that even seems a little fake. So it's not involved any connection with gay group or something else.

zh.description: 一个在你编程时疯狂夸你写的牛逼的 VSCode 扩展。
zh.tip-rainbow-fart: Most of Chinese known what does this mean, so no need to translate and display.
zh.tip-rainbow-fart-content: Most of Chinese known what does this mean, so no need to translate and display.
